//note: Don't remove js-xxhash despite it being unused, so it's included in the license disclaimer

scripts.build: yarn licenses generate-disclaimer --silent --prod > static/disclaimer.txt && sed "s/APPNAME/$(node -e "console.log(require('../config.json')['app-name'] || 'TagTime Web')")/g" static/manifest.webmanifest.template > static/manifest.webmanifest && sed "s/APPNAME/$(node -e "console.log(require('../config.json')['app-name'] || 'TagTime Web')")/g" static/index.html.template | sed "s*BACKSERV*$(node -e "console.log(require('../config.json')['api-server'])")*g" > static/index.html && rm -rf dist pkg && wasm-pack build ../taglogic/ --out-dir ../web/pkg && webpack
scripts.start: yarn licenses generate-disclaimer --silent --prod > static/disclaimer.txt && sed "s/APPNAME/$(node -e "console.log(require('../config.json')['app-name'] || 'TagTime Web')")/g" static/manifest.webmanifest.template > static/manifest.webmanifest && sed "s/APPNAME/$(node -e "console.log(require('../config.json')['app-name'] || 'TagTime Web')")/g" static/index.html.template | sed "s*BACKSERV*$(node -e "console.log(require('../config.json')['api-server'])")*g" > static/index.html && rm -rf dist pkg && wasm-pack build ../taglogic/ --out-dir ../web/pkg && webpack serve --host 0.0.0.0
